job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: who we areltbrgtcollaborative respectful a place to dream and do these are just a few words that describe what life is like at toyota as one of the worlds most admired brands toyota is growing and leading the future of mobility through innovative highquality solutions designed to enhance lives and delight those we serve were looking for diverse talented team members who want to dream do grow with usltbrgtwho were looking forltbrgtthis person will support the cpo manage the entire product life cycle from strategic to tactical planning and execution to improve system quality by identifying issues and common patterns and developing standard operating proceduresltbrgtwhat youll be doingltbrgt enhance applications by identifying opportunities for improvement making recommendations and designing and implementing systemsltbrgt maintain and improve existing codebases for the na and global market liaison with colleagues to implement technical designsltbrgt support the cpo to deliver consistent and relevant user experiences by developing a common global platform across all toyota affiliate regions utilize toyotas server and application platform to enable connected services within each affiliate regionltbrgt creation and execution of evaluation requirement documents test cases and test scriptsltbrgt research and identify new opportunities for ct to innovate and improve customer satisfactionltbrgt identify product development dependencies and integration pointsltbrgt provide uptodate development status
